name: The Defence of Lastower
description:
A four player co-op tower defence meets real-time-strategy meets action-RPG.

  • Battle waves of enemies with up to 3 friends in network co-op.
  • Play solo to improve your strategy and tactics.
  • Fortify your tower. Build, repair, upgrade, and unlock new turrets and weapons.
  • Choose a repeatable campaign to beat your best times.
  • Pick a character - Load them out with weapons, armour and tools.
  • Complete challenge modes to try playing a different way.
  • Loot crates and balancing impacting micro-transactions.  Kidding.

This game is in active development - it is still changing! New game-play features will be added, bugs will be fixed, and more bugs will be added. Your feed back is appreciated!

Playing the game:

  • W,A,S,D - Move your player
  • 1-7 - Shortcuts for the building menu. Use shift to use upper building menu options.
  • Q - Cancel construction/upgrade UI
  • Mouse1 - Shoot an enemy, build a turret, or upgrade a turret (must be in range for either action)

Technical information:

For hosting a game you should open UDP port 1338
